title: Daniel Lubetzky, Founder Of KIND Healthy Snacks
teaser: Host Jessica Harris speaks with Daniel Lubetzky, the founder of KIND Healthy Snacks, a natural foods company based in New York. Harris also speaks with Michael Brown, the co-founder of City Year.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris speaks with Daniel Lubetzky, the founder of KIND Healthy Snacks, a natural foods company based in New York.

Harris also speaks with Michael Brown, the co-founder of City Year.
